title: Cash Shop Update for November 1
content: Gachapon Update, Red Lotus Spirit Walker Package, Kanna Package, Hayato Package, and more!

title: Journey Toward the Sixth Star - Ch. VI
content: A new star is coming to Maple World, a new source of power beyond anything that's come before.

title: v.245 Hotfixes - October 27, 2023
content: Here you'll find a list of hotfixes that addresses a variety of bugs and issues reported within the v.245 - Midnight Carnival - Nautilus update.

title: Cash Shop Update for October 25
content: Halloween Surprise Style Box, Royal Styles, Ghost Bride Package, Vampire Phantom Package, and more!

title: [Completed] Scheduled Minor Patch - October 26, 2023
content: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 6 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.
